name: Sarah & John's Wedding
description: Join us as we celebrate the union of Sarah and John in an elegant ceremony followed by dinner and dancing. We can't wait to share this special day with our closest family and friends.

name: Emma's 25th Birthday Bash
description: Let's celebrate Emma turning 25 with a rooftop party overlooking the city! Dress code: cocktail attire. There will be dinner, drinks, dancing, and plenty of photo opportunities.

name: TechCorp Annual Conference 2024
description: Our annual company conference featuring keynote speakers, networking sessions, and team building activities. This year's theme is 'Innovation Through Collaboration'.

name: Baby Shower for Jessica
description: Celebrating the upcoming arrival of baby Miller! Join us for an afternoon of games, gifts, and good food in a beautiful garden setting.

name: Mike & Lisa's Engagement Party
description: Come celebrate our engagement with dinner by the beach and dancing under the stars. We're so excited to share this milestone with everyone we love!

name: Class of 2014 - 10 Year Reunion
description: It's been 10 years since graduation! Come reconnect with old friends, share memories, and see how everyone has grown. Dinner will be served followed by a DJ and photo booth.
